Class WarMap

java.lang.Object
Models.WarMap
public class WarMap extends Object
This class describes information stores a WarMap to be used in the game, it's main use is to store the countries, continents and adjency list of neighbouring countries It also contains the functions for validating, saving and showing the game map.

  • Constructor Details

    • WarMap

      public WarMap()
      This is a default constructor method of the Models.WarMap class

    • WarMap

      public WarMap(String p_mapName)
      This is a parameterized constructor method of the Models.WarMap class
      Parameters:
      p_mapName - is the map's name (generally the file name).

    • WarMap

      public WarMap(String p_mapName, HashMap<Integer,Country> p_countries, HashMap<Integer,Continent> p_continents, HashMap<Integer,HashMap<Integer,Integer>> p_adjencyList)
      This is a parameterized constructor method of the Models.WarMap class
      Parameters:
      p_mapName - is the map's name (generally the file name).
      p_countries - is a hashmap of the countries in the map where the hashmap contains keys with the countries ID and the values are the corresponding countries.
      p_continents - is a hashmap of the continents in the map where the hashmap contains keys with the continent Id's and the values are the corresponding continents.
      p_adjencyList - is a hashmap of the neighbouring countries in the map where the hashmap contains keys with the country IDs and the values are a list of the country Id's of neighbouring countries.

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(Country p_country)
      Function used for adding a Country to the HashMap containing the Countries of the map.
      Parameters:
      p_country - the country to be added to the WarMap.

    • addNeighbour

      public void addNeighbour(int p_countryID, int p_neighbourID)
      Function used for adding a neighbour country, this will add a neighbour to the country, as well as update the adjency list.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - the country who will have a neighbour added.
      p_neighbourID - the neighbouring country to be added.

    • removeNeighbour

      public void removeNeighbour(int p_countryID, int p_neighbourID)
      Function used for removing a neighbour country, this will remove a neighbour from the country, as well as update the adjency list.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - the country who will have a neighbour added.
      p_neighbourID - the neighbouring country to be added.

    • validateMap

      public boolean validateMap()
      Function that should be called to validate a WarMap.
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean which is true if the map is valid, and false if the map is invalid.

    • saveMap

      public void saveMap(String p_map_name)
      A function which saves the WarMap to a file.
      Parameters:
      p_map_name - The file name/map name for the WarMap you wish to save

    • showMap

      public void showMap()
      A function which prints the WarMap to the console in a readable format.

    • showMap

      public void showMap(List<Player> p_players)
      A function which prints the WarMap to the console in a readable format which also shows ownership of the countries based on the list of players passed.
      Parameters:
      p_players - a list of players playing on the current WarMap

      p_continentName - The Name of the continent
      p_armybonus - The army bonus of the continent

      Parameters:
      l_input_country_ID - The first country's ID
      l_input_country_neighbor_ID - The second country's ID
